definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]

sentences.english: Simmer gently for 20 m then drain the solution.
sentences.chinese: 文火煎20分鐘，然後將藥水潷出。

sentences.english: If sediment and decanting must simultaneously carry on, please specify decanting time.
sentences.chinese: 如沉澱與潷水過程同時進行，請註明潷水器時間。

sentences.english: If sediment and decanting must simultaneously carry on, please specify decanting time.
sentences.chinese: 如沉澱與潷水過程同時進行，請註明潷水器時間。

sentences.english: Squaring a whiskey decanter creates a unique shape.
sentences.chinese: 磨邊一個威士忌潷水器創建了一個獨特的形狀。

sentences.english: The design and application of a new style SBR water decanter was studied in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 文章重點介紹套筒式潷水器的設計及應用。

sentences.english: The revolving water decanter is an important equipment in the SBR process.
sentences.chinese: 旋轉式潷水器是SBR工藝處理法中重要裝置。

definition: of flourishing appearance/sound of a bicycle bell
operculum (Latin: little lid)/a covering flap (in various branches of anatomy)
to pace back and forth/to hesitate/to waver
